name: Void: Anything Goes
description:
Here's The Early Access To "Void: Anything Goes", a Fighting Game.

 Try To Combo Your Way Into A Victory Or Play Metodicly For A Perfect Victory.

Currently Available: 

-> Singleplayer Campaing Mode;

-> 3 levels;

-> 2 Playble Chracters;

 The Core Combat Mixes A Standart Tournament Fighter With Elements Of Arena.

 The Game Also Has Accessibility Features.
